successes.title: 7 Days to Die  - Zombie Survival Game
successes.description: An open world, voxel-based, sandbox game blending the best elements of FPS, Survival Horror, Tower Defense and Role Playing Games.

Pledges.description: THE SCAVENGER - Kickstarter Backer Badge for the 7 Days to Die forums.
THE SETTLER - Download the finished game for PC, Mac or Linux + Kickstarter Backer Badge
THE WARRIOR - Early Beta Access + Finished Game + Kickstarter Backer Badge
THE SUNRISE SURVIVALIST - Early Alpha Access + Beta + Finished Game + Kickstarter Backer Badge
THE CARTOGRAPHER - Collectable printed 11 x 17 World Map + Name in the credits + Alpha + Beta + Finished Game + Kickstarter Backer Badge
THE ALPHA BUDDIES - Early Alpha Access for 2 + Beta for 2 + Finished Game for 2 + Kickstarter Backer Badge for 2 - Get 2 copies of the game!
THE LOOTER - Collectable printed 18 x 24 Character Poster + Name in the credits + Alpha + Beta + Finished Game + Kickstarter Backer Badge
THE EXPLORER - Collectable 7 Days to Die T-Shirt + Name in the credits + Alpha + Beta + Finished Game + KickStarter Backer Badge
THE TREASURE HUNTER  - 7 Days to Die T-Shirt + Character Poster + World Map + Name in the credits + Alpha + Beta + Finished Game + Kickstarter Backer Badge
THE ALPHA CLAN - Early Alpha Access for 4 + Beta for 4 + Finished Game for 4 + Kickstarter Backer Badge for 4 - Get 4 copies of the game!

THE WASTELAND AMIGO - Name in the story of the game (Our choice your first name, last name and nickname) + 7 Days to Die T-Shirt + Character Poster + World Map + Name in the credits + Alpha + Beta + Finished Game + Kickstarter Backer Badge

THE ENCAMPMENT – 1 Free Month of your own Game Server and Control Panel + 7 Days to Die T-Shirt + Character Poster + World Map + Name in the credits + Alpha + Beta + Finished Game + Kickstarter Backer Badge.

THE HOMESTEADER - Location named after you (Our choice your first name, last name and nickname) + 7 Days to Die T-Shirt + Character Poster + World Map + Name in the credits + Alpha + Beta + Finished Game + Kickstarter Backer Badge

THE SETTLEMENT – 2 Free Months of your own Game Server and Control Panel + 7 Days to Die T-Shirt + Character Poster + World Map + Name in the credits + Alpha + 2 Beta + Finished Game + Kickstarter Backer Badge

THE VAIN SURVIVALIST - Get your picture on a sign, poster, paper or painting (Must submit a high res picture or yourself) + 7 Days to Die T-Shirt + Character Poster + World Map + Name in the credits + Alpha + Beta + Finished Game + Kickstarter Backer Badge

THE STRONGHOLD – 6 Free Months of your own Game Server and Control Panel + 7 Days to Die T-Shirt + Character Poster + World Map + Name in the credits + Alpha Copies + Beta Copies + Finished Game Copies + Kickstarter Backer Badge

BIG MAN ON THE WASTELAND - Get a major city or settlement named after you (Our choice your first name, last name and nickname) + 7 Days to Die T-Shirt + Character Poster + World Map + Name in the credits + Alpha + Beta + Finished Game + Kickstarter Backer Badge

THE SURVIVAL PARTY - 2 VIP tickets to the launch party to meet the developers in Dallas + 7 Days to Die T-Shirt + Character Poster + World Map + Name in the credits + Alpha + Beta + Finished Game + Kickstarter Backer Badge + Bring your World Map, Character Poster and T-Shirt to get signed by the team!

THE UNDEAD HEADS - Get a zombie likeness of yourself in the game (Must submit a high res picture or yourself) + 2 VIP tickets to the launch party + 7 Days to Die T-Shirt + Character Poster + World Map + Name in the credits + Alpha + Beta + Finished Game + Kickstarter Backer Badge

THE BANDITS - Get a Bandit likeness of yourself in the game (Must submit a high res picture or yourself) + 2 VIP tickets to the launch party + 7 Days to Die T-Shirt + Character Poster + World Map + Name in the credits + Alpha + Beta + Finished Game + Kickstarter Backer Badge

THE DUKE OF NAVEZGANE - Get the Duke of Navezgane made in your likeness (Must submit a high res picture of yourself) + 2 VIP tickets to the launch party + 7 Days to Die T-Shirt + Character Poster + World Map + Name in the credits + Alpha + Beta + Finished Game + Kickstarter Backer Badge
